an4.268:1.1: …pe… Attana ca pisunavaco hoti, paranca pisunaya vacaya samadapeti, pisunaya vacaya ca samanunno hoti, pisunaya vacaya ca vannam bhasati—imehi …pe….
an4.268:2.1: Attana ca pisunaya vacaya pativirato hoti, paranca pisunaya vacaya veramaniya samadapeti, pisunaya vacaya veramaniya ca samanunno hoti, pisunaya vacaya veramaniya ca vannam bhasati—imehi …pe….
